content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine and Iron Plate Factory at position(16.0, 71.0) and position(17.0, 74.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (16.0, 71.0)
- Burner mining drill at position (18.0, 71.0)
- Stone furnace at position (17.0, 74.0)
- Stone furnace at position (17.0, 76.0)
- Burner inserter at position (15.5, 74.5) that picks up iron ore from the transport belt connected to the burner mining drill and drops it into the stone furnace at position (17.0, 74.0)
- Burner inserter at position (19.5, 74.5) that picks up iron plates from the stone furnace at position (17.0, 74.0) and drops it into the wooden chest at position (18.5, 74.5)
- Burner inserter at position (15.5, 76.5) that picks up iron ore from the transport belt connected to the burner mining drill and drops it into the stone furnace at position (17.0, 76.0)
- Transport belt group that connects the burner mining drills to the burner inserters and then to the stone furnaces
- Wooden chest at position (18.5, 74.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items without required sub-ingredients or crafting machines
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft an item.
- Make sure to have the required crafting machines or furnaces to craft or smelt items.

### Errors when connecting transport belts directly to entities that are not transport belt endpoints
- Ensure that transport belts are connected to entities that can receive or provide items, such as inserters, and use those entities as the target for the transport belt connection.

### Errors when placing entities without checking the tile occupancy or inventory
- Make sure to check if a tile is occupied before attempting to place an entity on it.
- Ensure that the required items are available in the inventory before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when extracting items from entities that do not contain the required items
- Ensure that the target entity contains the required items before attempting to extract them.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before using them in the code.

### NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- `iron_drill`: BurnerMiningDrill (position (16.0, 71.0))
- `furnace`: StoneFurnace (position (17.0, 74.0))
- `inserter`: BurnerInserter (position (15.5, 74.5))
- `chest`: WoodenChest (position (18.5, 74.5))
- `new_iron_drill`: BurnerMiningDrill (position (18.0, 71.0))
- `new_furnace`: StoneFurnace (position (17.0, 76.0))
- `new_inserter`: BurnerInserter (position (15.5, 76.5))

No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the given execution logs. Therefore, the utility function signature section is not applicable in this case.
